name: Japanese Train Car (Edo)
space:
Japanese Train Car overlooking the river

Absolutely NO snorers allowed in the mixed room.


Free full western breakfast included, (served until 10am). 

Free Pickup service : Call until 2 hours before times listed below to reserve (we only go if there is a reservation for each time listed)

•4:30pm JR Nikko station / Tobu Nikko station
•6:30pm JR Nikko station / Tobu Nikko station
•9:00pm JR Nikko station / Tobu Nikko station
-Later arrivals, pickup is Shimogoshiro station on the Tobu Nikko line or Fubasami station on the JR Nikko line.

•No curfew / No Lockout -  enjoy the stars at night, hang out in the open air lounge area on the river, or take midnight strolls.  There are no souvenir shops and no city lights nearby. Only stars, trees and mountains and a beautiful river. 

•Free wifi internet everywhere (from optic fiber connection) including the beach, the open air lounge, common room, private rooms and annex rooms.  There is also and iMac in the common room.

Set amongst 250 cherry trees along the river.

You can hire bikes for 500 yen.  

Swimming tubes, snorkels and goggles free to use for swimming in the river at the hostel.

Check-in anytime from 4:00 pm to 11:30 pm / check-out before 11am, only guests reserved for the next night can stay around after 11 am

English-speaking
access:
BBQ area, river access, showers in what used to be the onsen area.
¥500 charge each to use a bike (there are 4 bikes)
